choices.name: Bundle_ONE_2_monitors_1_keyboard_mouse_combo_1_headset_and_1_dock_with_DisplayPo
choices.choiceText: Bundle ONE: 2 monitors, 1 keyboard/mouse combo, 1 headset, and 1 dock with DisplayPort to HDMI Adapter

value.stringValue: Bundle ONE: 2 monitors, 1 keyboard/mouse combo, 1 headset, and 1 dock with DisplayPort to HDMI Adapter

choices.name: Bundle_TWO_1_monitors_1_keyboard_mouse_combo_1_headset
choices.choiceText: Bundle TWO: 1 monitors, 1 keyboard/mouse combo, 1 headset

decisions.name: Check_if_Createdby_is_End_User
decisions.label: Check if Createdby is End User

rules.name: If_End_User_is_Standard_Platform_User
rules.label: If End User is Standard Platform User

formulas.name: varDescription
formulas.expression:
"First Name: " + {!First_Name_Screen} + "
" + "Last Name: " + {!Last_Name_Screen} +"
" + "Region: " + {!Region1} + "
" +"
" + "Email: " + {!ContactEmail.value} + "
" + "Phone: " + {!Phone_Screen.value} + "
" + "Job Title: " + {!Job_Title} + "
" + "Start Date: " + TEXT({!Start_Date_Screen}) + "
" + "Manager: " + {!Hiring_Manager.recordName} + "
" + IF ({!Region1} == {!EMEA}, "varE" +{!varDescriptionEMEA}, "") + IF ({!Region1} == 'Mexico', {!varDescriptionMX}, "") + IF ({!Region1} == 'USA', {!varDescriptionUSA}, "")

formulas.name: varUS_Billable
formulas.expression:
"
" + "Resource Type: Billable " + "
" + "Employee ID: " + {!Employee_ID_H_number} + "
" + "Email Domain: " +{!Email_Domain_US_B} + "
" + "Laptop: " + {!Laptop_Requested_US_B} + "
" + "License Type: " + {!Microsoft_License_Type} + "
" + IF({!Laptop_Requested_US_B} == 'No Laptop', "","
" +{!varAddress})

formulas.name: varUS_NonBillable
formulas.expression:
"
" + "Resource Type: Non Billable" + "
" + "Office: " + {!Office_US.recordName} + "
" + "Email Domain: " +{!Email_Domain_US_NB} + "
" + "Laptop Pickup: " + {!Laptop_Pickup_US_NB} +"
" + "Bundle: " + {!Bundle_US_NB}+ "
" + IF ( {!Laptop_Pickup_US_NB} == 'In Office', "Office: " + {!Office_US.recordName} , {!varAddress})
